metadata.title: CVE-2022-22817 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
PIL.ImageMath.eval in Pillow before 9.0.0 allows evaluation of arbitraryexpressions, such as ones that use the Python exec method. A lambdaexpression could also be used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.6
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.6').
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
